participant_1.background:
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
i work as a lifeguard.
I love my students.
i am mixed with puerto rica and chinese.
I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
i lost my arm in a car accident.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.
i work as a librarian.
I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.

content.text: Hey, I'm a lifeguard at a pool in Pittsburgh. What's your name?
Hi! I'm a librarian at the local library. I'm participant_2.
Nice to meet you! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like cooking and running. I'm also really good at it.
That's really cool! I used to love running, but my feet can't take it anymore.
Oh no! That's too bad. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to take pictures of Pittsburgh. I'm mixed with Puerto Rican and Chinese, so I think it's interesting to capture the different cultures here.
That's really cool! I love taking pictures too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
It's always fun to take pictures, even if they're not perfect.
I agree! I think it's a good way to capture memories.
Well, it was nice meeting you!
You too! Have a great day!
